description: An all-round touring boot that is packed with features, the Atomic Backland Pro offers the ideal balance of light weight climbing efficiency and a secure fit for controlled and responsive downhill performance. Top tier technology at a good price, the boot offers top-end features like Prolite construction and a Cross Lace 2.0 closure system that integrates a cable into the buckle for a more precise shell wrap and a more secure fit around the foot and ankle for powerful skiing. The Frictionless Pivot and Free/Lock 4.0 ski/walk mechanism provide 74º of natural movement for trouble-free climbing. Offering more foot hold and customization potential, the PVC-free 3D Platinum Tour liner is breathable and washable and is equipped with Dura Shield, a two-stage protection of TPU and durable mesh that extends the life of the liner.
name: Backland Pro Ski Boots

specs.value: Revolutionary light construction with supportive reinforcements in key zones.
Igus polymer bushings provide a completely natural movement for effortless ascents.
Reinforcement in key zones giving extra strength and edge grip for powerful skiing.
